actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to prohibit contracting for the construction of vessels for U.S. Navy at places outside of the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits the contracting for the construction of any vessel for the United States Navy at any place outside of the United States. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 7309)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to prohibit contracting for the construction of vessels for U.S. Navy at places outside of the United States.
